title: Extended by Popular Demand: Portugal Secluded Coastal Suites near Lisbon with Daily Breakfast &, Dining Credit
description:
Tucked between pine forests and golden Atlantic beaches, this newly renovated seaside resort is your gateway to Portugal’s most coveted coastline. Sip cocktails by the palm-lined Flow Pool Bar, dine under the stars at Glass Terrace or indulge in sushi perfection at Yakuza. From relaxing spa rituals to bike rentals and a kids’ club - every moment here is designed to delight.

Cascais is hands-down one of Portugal's most jaw-dropping destinations. Just a quick hop from Lisbon but worlds away from the hustle - this is where luxury travellers come to recharge, whether you're teeing off at championship courses, soaking up legendary Atlantic sunsets, or simply living the coastal dream life.
offer_address: Rua das Palmeiras 5, Quinta da Marinha, Cascais 2750-005, Portugal
